title: True Religion Men's Ricky Flap Sn 32 Inseam Jeans
description: Premium Denim Fabric – Crafted with high-quality materials for durability and comfort
32-Inch Inseam – Standard length providing a comfortable and versatile fit
2SB Body Rinse Black Wash – Sleek and versatile black wash ideal for day-to-night wear
Signature Flap Pockets – Features True Religion’s iconic horseshoe stitching on back flap pockets
Relaxed Straight-Leg Fit – Combines comfort and style, suitable for various occasions and body types

Elevate your denim collection with the True Religion Men's Ricky Flap Sn Jeans, featuring a 32-inch inseam in the 2SB Body Rinse Black wash. Designed with the brand’s signature horseshoe stitching on the back flap pockets, these jeans combine premium quality with a sleek, modern look. The relaxed straight-leg fit ensures comfort without sacrificing style, making these jeans perfect for both casual and dressed-up occasions.
